Title: BWB Jack Point Configuration
Problem_Statement: Jack point locations and load capacities for BWB geometry are undefined. Conventional tube-and-wing jacking procedures do not apply. Need to determine: (1) optimal jack point positions for BWB planform, (2) required jack capacities considering asymmetric loading scenarios, (3) adapter geometries for composite skin interface.
Scope: In: Jack positions; load requirements; adapter concepts. Out: Structural reinforcement design (ATA 53/57); facility floor loading.

Title: Load Cell Range and Accuracy
Problem_Statement: Weighing system accuracy requirements for hydrogen aircraft with variable LH₂ fuel states are undefined. Key unknowns: (1) total aircraft mass range (OEW to MTOW with LH₂ variations), (2) required accuracy class for CG determination, (3) environmental compensation requirements (temperature, pressure).
Scope: In: Load cell specs; accuracy class; environmental range. Out: Calibration procedures (08-40); on-board system integration (08-10).

Title: LH₂ State Compensation Algorithm
Problem_Statement: Algorithm for compensating weighing results based on LH₂ tank fill state is undefined. Liquid hydrogen exhibits significant density variation with temperature and ortho-para ratio. Need methodology to: (1) correlate tank sensors with actual LH₂ mass, (2) propagate uncertainty through CG calculation, (3) validate against direct measurement.
Scope: In: Compensation algorithm; uncertainty model; validation approach. Out: Tank instrumentation (ATA 28); flight test procedures.

Title: Composite Adapter Materials
Problem_Statement: Jack adapter materials and designs for interfacing with composite airframe structure are undefined. Traditional steel adapters may cause local stress concentrations or surface damage. Need to determine: (1) adapter material selection (aluminum, CFRP, elastomer interface), (2) load spreading geometry, (3) inspection criteria for adapter wear.
Scope: In: Material selection; adapter geometry; inspection criteria. Out: Airframe damage tolerance (ATA 53/57); NDI procedures.

Title: Digital Integration Protocol
Problem_Statement: Data interface protocol between GSE weighing equipment and aircraft/ground systems is undefined. Need to establish: (1) data format and schema for weight/CG records, (2) authentication and integrity mechanisms, (3) integration with DPP traceability system, (4) export formats for certification evidence.
Scope: In: Interface protocol; data schema; security requirements. Out: Aircraft avionics interface (ATA 46); DPP ledger architecture (ATA 96).

Title: Safety Interlock Architecture
Problem_Statement: Safety interlock system architecture for jacking operations is undefined. BWB configuration presents unique hazards including asymmetric load paths and limited visual cues. Need to define: (1) sensor suite for load monitoring, (2) automatic shutoff criteria, (3) manual override procedures, (4) failure mode responses.
Scope: In: Interlock architecture; sensor requirements; failure modes. Out: Jack hydraulic design; facility emergency systems (08-60).
